attributes.action: Stop using lottery receipts to fund projects that should properly funded by the Exchequer out of public taxation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Funds derived from the National Lottery were never intended as a subsitute for core goverment funding of health and education, but were meant to be based on the concept of 'additionality'. Since 1998 and with the formation of New Opportunites Fund, now merged with the Charities Board to create the Big Lottery Fund, this concept has been seriously undermined.
